title: VirtualDub Pack  [VirtualDub + mods + plugins]
description:
----------------
VirtualDub Pack
----------------

INFO:


VirtualDub is a video capture/processing utility for 32-bit Windows platforms (95/98/ME/NT4/2000/XP), licensed under the GNU General Public License (GPL). Created by Avery Lee the VirtualDub is one of the most downloaded and known video editor in the world.


ABOUT THIS INSTALLER:


To avoid messing with multiple downloading, unpacking, copying plugins, etc i created myself simple installer that would install everything with couple clicks.
So here it is: VirtualDub Pack


VirtualDub Pack will install following:

VirtualDub 1.9.1 (experimental) with 93 plugins
VirtualDub MPEG2 1.6.19 build 24586 with 93 plugins
VirtualDubMod 1.5.10.2 build 2542 with 93 plugins

They all are in separate directories to avoid any conflicts.

To install just run the setup, choose installation location and install. Shortcuts will be created to desktop and in start menu.
This installer and all files scanned with NOD32 (database version 4050)
